COMMAND.NAME: selectioninfo
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION:
Return the following information about the selection in bufferName
startLineline number where selection starts.
EndLineline number where selection ends.
TotalSegmentstotal number of selection segments.
TotalSpantotal number of character selected.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
